Query: Trace the chronological development of the damages calculation.

[Joe Schuster Outline #1.docx, p.1]
Were you aware of issues like lost traceability, paint mismatches, and missed warranty review on outsourced parts? (Farnham p. 13; PHB p. 17).

[3. Mike Brown (FAZ) Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]

Q: Can the tribunal trace each number in your report back to its source?

[Mike Brown (FAZ) Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]
Theme: The damages claimed are based on industry-standard, cautious assumptions and directly traceable to Gulfstream’s extended delays.

[Mike Brown (FAZ) Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]
A. Yes. All assumptions and methodologies are stated clearly in the report, and the underlying calculations are traceable.

corrosion findings, shipment to Gulfstream Savannah, loss of traceability, and the initial

Savannah for corrosion removal and evaluation. This resulted in delays, loss of traceability for

[PDF 2 - EXPERT WITNESS REPORT                                     March 5 copy.pdf, p.14]
